title: Dmitri Shikhovtsev
text:
Dmitri Sergeyevich Shikhovtsev (; born 7 April 1986) is a former <a href="Russia">Russia</a>n <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="Defender%20%28association%20football%29">defender</a>.
Club career.
Born in <a href="Moscow">Moscow</a>, he played in the youth and reserves team of <a href="FC%20Dynamo%20Moscow">FC Dynamo Moscow</a> between 1999 and 2006.
He made his <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League">Russian Football National League</a> debut for <a href="FC%20Tekstilshchik-Telekom%20Ivanovo">FC Tekstilshchik-Telekom Ivanovo</a> on 2 August 2007 in a game against <a href="FC%20Ural%20Yekaterinburg">FC Ural Yekaterinburg</a>.
In February 2009 he moved abroad and joined <a href="FK%20Radni%C4%8Dki%201923">FK Radnički 1923</a> in the <a href="Serbian%20First%20League">Serbian First League</a> playing with them during the second half of the 2008-09 season and the 2009-10 season in which the club used the name "FK Šumadija Radnički" during the first part of the season after a merger with another local club.
In early 2012 Dmitri Shikhovtsev joined <a href="FC%20Saturn%20Moscow%20Oblast%20%28founded%201991%29">FC Saturn Moscow Oblast</a> playing in the <a href="Russian%20Second%20Division">Russian Second Division</a>.
